mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.description AS "description", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", su.name AS "updateBy.name"
left join sys_user su on a.update_id = su.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_property_info( id, name, description, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_property_info SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
